title: Monotone/Colorful
description: A former piano prodigy is about to discover that a seemingly small event can drastically alter the direction of a person's life.

title: Friend A
description: Kousei gets tricked into going to a performance by his close childhood friend and in that performance he starts to regain a shred of his passion.

title: Inside Spring
description: Kousei's friends work together to try to convince him to accompany Kaori at her next recital.

title: Departure
description: Kousai being Kaori's accompanist appears to be a bad idea.

title: Gray Skies
description: Kaori is hospitalized after the competition. Kousei thinks deeply that playing the piano is the only way he can live. Tsubaki gets asked out by her senior she had admired before.

title: On the Way Home
description: Kaori wants Kousei to continue playing the piano

title: The Shadows Whisper
description: Kousei isn't sure that he could master a set piece of music

title: Let It Ring
description: Takeshi Aiza and Emi Igawa. These two have a strong rivalry with Kousei. But what drives them to play piano?

title: Resonance
description: It's Kousei's turn to take the stage

title: The Scenery I Shared with You
description: Kousei's performance begins. He starts off on a roll

title: Light of Life
description: The qualifiers are up

title: Twinkle Little Star
description: School broke up for the summer vacation

title: Love's Sadness
description: It's the day of the gala concert

title: Footprints
description: Kaori has been hospitalized since the day before gala concert. Kousei went to see Kaori in the hospital with Tsubaki and Ryota. He gets a bad feeling because she reminds him of his mother. Meanwhile

title: Liar
description: Kousei decided that he'll leave home to study music in school when spring arrives. Tsubaki broke up with her boyfriend because he has already realized she loves Kousei. Meanwhile

title: Two of a Kind
description: Hiroko decided to let Kousei teach the piano to Nagi. Nagi can't fully dislike him

title: Twilight
description: Kaori told Kousei what kind of situation she is now by quoting the lines of the novel that they have read

title: Hearts Come Together
description: Kousei asks Nagi to let him perform at the Kurumigaoka Junior High culture festival. He wants to reach Kaori through his music. With that in mind

title: Goodbye Hero
description: Kaori decided strongly that she undergoes surgery to play music with Kousei again. Kousei practices intensively for a competition

title: Hand in Hand
description: Tsubaki told Kousei that he loves Kaori

title: Snow
description: The shock of seeing Kaori's condition suddenly take a turn for the worse causes Kousei to once again turn away from the piano. Music takes away everyone I care about... His past trauma flashing through his mind

title: Spring Breeze
description: Kousei realizes that he's onstage now because of the people in his life - the same people who support him. Playing the notes that they all gave him
